overview: A real-time account of the events on United Flight 93, one of the planes hijacked on 9/11 that crashed near Shanksville, Pennsylvania when passengers foiled the terrorist plot.
tagline: September 11, 2001. Four planes were hijacked. Three of them reached their target. This is the story of the fourth.
cast: J.J. Johnson|Gary Commock|Polly Adams|Opal Alladin|Starla Benford
